name: Love Land
description:
Have fun discovering the islands

“I can’t wait to discover more islands!”

“Learning about sexual health is definitely fun on Love Land!”

"This is the type of approach that is needed when working to disseminate information about sexual and reproductive health, that is why we would highly recommend Taboobreaker’s LOVE LAND!"

- The Justice Desk, Cape Town, South Africa

LOVE LAND is the ultimate app for having fun while learning about sexual health.

Are you ready to discover Goomi Goomi, Jungle Lady or the Caveman Island?

Here we go!

Create your avatar and cruise to the islands of your choice.

Can you fight against the fogglets who want to keep the topics around sexual health a big taboo?

Try it out while navigating through the jungle and finding a character in need who waits for your help to solve tricky tasks. 

Find the magic scrolls that lead you to knowledge on sexuality, body and health in a simple and humorous manner.

And if you feel like, test your gained skills in the mini-games and be awarded.

Why should you download it?

LOVE LAND has been tested by thousands of young people before it was thrown on the market: Only best is good enough for the support of young people on their journey of life!

While sexual education is often a tabooed thing in society and school, LOVE LAND tackles this topic by combining fun and easy understandable learning content.

In addition, the app leads you to more content on our lovelandgame.org website.

And as sexual topics are very intimate: Of course, LOVE LAND is a super safe platform. No one will ever find out what topics were explored, neither will any data be shared in public!

With LOVE LAND we provide a ticket in first class including fun, learning and improving life skills – of course free of charge.

LOVE LAND is steadily extended with additional Islands and content.

Stay tuned! 

What is the goal of LOVE LAND?

The LOVE LAND App is based on the International Technical Guidance on Sexuality Education of UNESCO and has the aim to foster the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDG’s) 3, 4, 5 and 10. 

The LOVE LAND App provides and attractive an accessible means, in the form of thematic games, that young people can access sound information and develop their skills in reducing their risks of early sexual initiation, unwanted pregnancies, risky and harmful practices and sexually transmitted infections (STIs - including life-changing HIV, hepatitis and herpes).

Get more information on: www.lovelandgame.org

Follow us on tiktok: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMeKN5RGh/

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/loveland.game/

Important Message for Parents

This game may include:

- Direct links to websites that provide support in the field of sexual and reproductive health

- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
